description: This file defines a TypeScript class 'SourceMap' that represents a source map compliant with the SourceMap v3 specification. It includes functionality to initialize the object with mapping data, convert mappings using imported functions, and serialize the object to JSON.

classes.name: SourceMap
classes.description: A class representing a source map that can be serialized to a JSON string. It encapsulates properties like file name, mappings, source root, source contents, and version, and provides a constructor for initialization based on provided mapping data and options.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes a SourceMap instance by transforming the input map with either decoded or encoded mapping functions based on options, then setting properties accordingly.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Serializes the SourceMap instance to a JSON string.
